name: Virus Spread
description:
Game was created for GMTK 2020: Out of control.

I interpret this theme as don't let virus get out of control.

You have unnamed country with 5 regions. Your goal survive as many days as you can.

This is early build with many ideas that not included at this moment. Like many types of viruses, like zombie virus and etc.

Also research tab and control tab have lack of options.

Game was designed for 1920x1080 16:9.

Sorry i don't have much time to create menu :C
